## ease variable

HOF exponential easing.

- `ease = 1` -<!-- -->&gt; linear - `ease > 1` -<!-- -->&gt; ease in - `ease < 1` -<!-- -->&gt; ease out

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
ease: (ease: number, t: number) => number
```
